enWisdom: Indeed the secrets have been revealed for people of insight

Wisdom: لَقَدْ أَخْطَأَ الْعَاقِلُ اللَّاهِي الرُّشْدَ وَأَصَابَهُ ذُو الِاجْتِهَادِ وَالْجِدِّ
enWisdom: Indeed the intelligent one who is heedless strays from the path of right guidance and the one who strives with seriousness [to find it] gets it

Wisdom: لَيْسَ الرُّؤْيَةُ مَعَ الْأَبْصَارِ قَدْ تَكْذِبُ الْأَبْصَارُ أَهْلَهَا
enWisdom: Vision is not attained by sight [alone], for sight can fool its possessor

Wisdom: مَنْ تَعَمَّقَ لَمْ يَنُبْ إِلَى الْحَقِّ
enWisdom: One who delves too deep [in trying to understand the essence of Allah] does not return to the truth

Wisdom: مَنْ كَشَفَ مَقَالاتِ الْحُكَمَاءِ انْتَفَعَ بِحَقَائِقِهَا
enWisdom: One who unveils the words of the wise benefits from their hidden meanings

Wisdom: لَا عِلْمَ لِمَنْ لَا بَصِيرَةَ لَهُ
ضُرُوبُ الْأَمْثَالِ تُضْرَبُ لِأُولِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: Metaphors are given for the people of intellect and insight
There is no practice better than verification
